explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a data mining framework which involves machine learning techniques such as clustering and regression.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The data clustering algorithm used to select representative variable annuity contracts is an example of unsupervised learning.
explanations.regression: The paper uses a regression model to predict quantities of interest for the whole portfolio based on the representative contracts.
explanations.clustering: The paper employs a data clustering algorithm to select representative variable annuity contracts, which is a key component of the proposed framework.
